title: Jordyn Woods’ mum Elizabeth is taken to hospital
text:
Speedy recovery, Elizabeth (Picture: Rex; @elizabethwoods)

Jordyn Woods has revealed her mother Elizabeth Woods has been taken to hospital for a mystery illness. But it brought back sad memories of her father’s sudden death almost three years ago.

The 22-year-old model shared an emotional Instagram story on Monday to share the concerning news about her beloved mum.

Without revealing specific details about Elizabeth’s health, Jordyn explained that she spent the night by her mother’s hospital bedside.

In a heartfelt message, Jordyn wrote: ‘Last time one of my parents was in the hospital he ended up passing suddenly. Staying in the hospital with my mom tonight and I know she’s going to be fine.

‘God is just throwing me all of these obstacles just to prepare and make me stronger than ever.’

She added optimistically: ‘Please pray for a speedy recovery for @elizabeth woods… we need you healthy mommy [sic].’

Elizabeth also confirmed her unfortunate hospital visit with photos of the drip in her hand, with the captions: ‘Didn’t think today I would be in the hospital. I get to spend the night in the hospital.’

But refusing to allow even an illness to keep her from work, she added: ‘Working from a hospital bed tonight.’

Jordyn has become even closer to her mother, who is also her manager, since the tragic death of her father John Woods in January 2017.

John, who was a successful cameraman and worked on shows like The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, died just two weeks after he was diagnosed with cancer.

At the time of his death, Jordyn posted a tribute to her dad with a photo of them holding hands while he lay in his hospital bed.

‘Last night heaven Got Another angel. My Daddy. Just two short weeks ago he was diagnosed with cancer and by that time it was too late. I appreciate everyone’s kind words and it means the world to me. It still doesn’t feel real. Forever and Always,’ she wrote.

Elizabeth said at the time: ‘Tonight my best friend of so many years rode off into the sunset on a forever long Harley ride. Thank you for being a great husband , best friend and thank you for our fabulous kids and I’m so numb that I can’t even believe this is real. RIP my angel John. #teamigotthis #family #love #mobbinforlife #f**kcancer [sic].’
